name: Firefox: Minimal Elegance Theme, transparency
description:
My new theme called Minimal Elegance for new Firefox. It's a transparent theme for firefox with minimalistic style. You can see it on screenshot.

!!!!IMPORTANT!!!
For effect us is in screenshot you need Stratiform addon.
Stratiform - https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/stratiform/
!!!!IMPORTANT!!!


and if you want bookmarks buttons on right of screenshot download:
Google shortcuts - https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/google-shortcuts-all-google-se/

Enjoy this theme ;)
additional_info:
WARNING!!! Firefox 29 isn't compatible with this theme and Stratiform too. Theme will be updated as Stratiform 4.0 will be realeased

FAQ:
1. Firefox button is still default.
- You must have Stratiform and in Stratiform setting click on Settings and there is Firefox button, click on Always.

2. Adress bar and panels are rounded. I want to it like on screenshot.
- You must have Stratiform and in stratiform settings click on Settings and you can adjust it according to your vision.

3. Where can I find integrated search bar into adress bar?
- It's addon Omnibar (download: https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/omnibar/ )
